paragraphs: I started coding when I was 10 years old and began my BSc(Hons) Software Engineering degree at the Java Institute for Advanced Technology in 2021. Since then, I have been pursuing my dream of becoming a software engineer.
I attended St. Peter's College, Bambalapitiya, and I am from Sri Lanka. My passion lies in building innovative software solutions and exploring new technologies.

Currently, I focus on full-stack development, creating accessible and high-performance applications, and contributing to meaningful projects. Outside coding, I enjoy learning about new tech trends, gaming, and working on personal projects that challenge my skills.
